A lesson: don't panic

 There is no right or wrong way to do it. It all depends on your situation.

A lesson: “I can’t fly” because it’s hard
And the lesson: get used to flying

A lesson: don't get caught up in the scheme of things. Be open to new experiences.
Don't give up on life.

A lesson:

Always remember and accept that life is not a one-way street. There are many ways to enjoy each other's company. There is no set formula for enjoying well.
A lesson: Open your eyes. Hold your head back. Feel and see everything. Feel for a few moments. Then let loose a great sound.
A lesson: repetition works.
A lesson: learn to surf.

A lesson:
A soul on a spike.
A journey to the throne.
Beautiful things in the world.
But the soul is not there.
See? The soul isn't there.
See? The journey has not begun.
There's nothing to it.
This is a spiritual journey.
There is only the void, and that's me.
There's nothing else to it.

A lesson: 

Inarticulate speech
Inarticulate speech out of context
Inarticulate speech sounds complicated
It's hard to make sense of it
Inarticulate speech sounds easy

A lesson: the drama of the universe, not so much

The angel of imagination, the sage of the desert,
The angel of speech, the loving father of children
Rouseyantov, the embodiment of spirit,
The incarnation of the mind, the gentle governor of the body
The buddha of wisdom, the great enquirer during the golden ages

A lesson:

· Get used to it. Don't be afraid to explore new waters.
· Be open to explore other lands. This can be the new land of the free-spirited, the insane and the .NET person.
· Knowledge and abilities to understand life outside of the physical body. This can be the spiritual, the mundane or the astral.
· Strong personal will and will to express itself through different means. Often both.
· and .NET people are better equipped to recognize when something is definitely wrong with the group it is about to enter.

A lesson:

1. Be fearless of change.
2. Be fearless of the old. Be fearless of the familiar.
3. Be fearless of the new. Be fearless of the old-world.
4. Be fearless of change. If it grates on you, put a wing on it!
5. Show compassion for those in need.
6. Be kind hearted. 
7. Be gentle. Be kind. Be sympathetic.

A lesson:
      imagine that the universe consists of many equalities: 

             (1 + 2 = 3),
             (3 + 3 = 4),
              (4 + 4 = 5), and
              (6 +  5 = 6).

A lesson: Never buy a spiritual experience that involves buying and never letting go. 

When dealing with others, always remember that the learner is not the turtle. The turtle is the master, so don't give chase.

A lesson:

· Always remember your own mistakes.
· Become detached from your loved ones and your thoughts.
· Be fearless. 
· Be realistic. 
· Be true to yourself.
· Be individualistic. 
· Be true to life's purpose.
· Be true to yourself. 
· Be true to be universal in your faith.

I am almost complete. “I am every living, important thing in the world.”

You are indeed. But why be complete when you can just float and become something else?

I am not a mind; 
I am not a substance. 
I am not a system.
I'm not a pointing a gun at a system, just a point of view.

I am no longer a devotee
I am not a ventriloquist
I am not at all afraid of anything
I am not going to back down now
I am not a passive participant
I am awake 
You will be like me in the future
Koan:  No Me, No Knowledge
Koan: The Last Step
Koan: 'Let's make a world where everything is going to be alright.'
Koan: The Tunnel of Obliteration
Koan: Everything Is Actually Different
Koan: 'Existence is No Longer There It Seems'

Let go of the self, and let go of the giver.

If you want to know what the moon looks like, look only at its thought. 
If you want to know what the stars are like, look only at their thought. 
If you want to know what the geology of the world is like, look only at their thought.
Let go of your craving, and become a living entity of the universe.

Let go of your own
You will be the whole world
If you keep on trying to figure it out
You'll get so hung up on trying
And trying and trying
For this moment
You've been waiting
For this moment

You're in on the whole truth
All of you
All of you
All of you
All of you
All of you
All of you
All of you
All of you
Let go of what you've been carrying.

Let go of your empty head. You're going to follow the stream of thoughts and wake up to it. You're going to experience it immediately. 

So wake up.  

Just in the same way you would if you became a true Buddhist. 
You would come out of the womb and see all the flowers and the reverie.

Let go of the trainee and let them go. But most important, let them go unchecked.
Let them try and find their way through this thing that nobody's even trying to go through. 
There are so many avenues for that. 
But the combat zone is the dead zone.
And you must always be aware of the dead zone.
You've been warned

Let go of your preconception. 
Go back to being yourself. 
Be open to new experiences. 
Be open to life without your own skin.
You are totally free of the gravitational field of the world.
Let go of the wheel of time

Let go of your guide,
Go directly into the innermost circle of the heart
Into the spiritual wisdom
Into the light
And the light of the adept
Out of body and soul
In the light
Out of body and soul
In the light of the adept

What is it?

Let go of those waters,
And let the heaven be filled with your radiance

And let the radiance of the heavens radiate
Down through the ages
Blue and gold and pine
You made the world
I'm going down to the watering hole

Let go of your pride
And roll your eyes at the world that seems so Perfect

Let go of your telescopes,
grab the stars,
 and follow them like meteors fall from the sky.
Let go of your visualization techniques. They're just techniques.

Let go of what you have created, and let go of all the illusions and worries that keep you from being present in the truth.
Let go of all the illusions and worries that keep you from being present in the truth that is Truth.
Let go of your life. Just go out there for a little while.
